item.title: Adding Docksal to a Basic Project
item.description: Scenario As lead developer on a team you’ve run into a lot of issues with your teammates submitting features for code review and you notice that your continuous integration testing fails frequently. When you pull down to test for yourself, you see a lot of code that was deprecated in a previous version of PHP and will break if run on the version of PHP that your hosting provider uses.
